post.text: It's in the emails! Someone WAS unethically helping #CrookedHillary's campaign! She got the question VERBATIM!

comment.author: Austin
comment.text: Along with ear mics too... Hillarys always boasting about accountability, but never apologized to Bernie Sanders for the injustice done to him by the DNC during the primary race...Schultz was fired, but Hillary rehired her and Bernie pretended to be angry, but then endorsed Hillary? Talking about screwed up? You would have thought the mainstream media would have had that news on everyday till Election Day...and Bernie supports are going to vote for her, really?

replies.author: Kayvon
replies.text: Yes, really. The rules of 2016 were the rules of 2008. Each candidate knows the rules going into a primary. There was no "injustice."

replies.author: Morgan
replies.text: She screwed Bernie over big time

replies.author: Jennifer
replies.text: Kayvon, are you okay in the head?

replies.author: Chelsea
replies.text: Hillary paid Bernie $600,000 to get his endorsement. He bought a new summer home with the money.
